Name: Loch Almond Highball
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass and then fill with ice.
Review: If you haven't got to grips with Scotch but like amaretto, try this delicately ginger almond combination.
Nutrition: One serving of Loch Almond Highball contains 221 calories
Garnish: Amaretti biscuit resting across glass rim & ice
